lyrics:
"Horror Flick" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Horror Flick" We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (It's Gucci!) We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie (yeah) Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit (huh?) She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (it's Gucci!) We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie (yeah) Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (yeah) I talk trash like every pay My dope jump like Shawn Kemp Need to hire Perry mason 'cause I just caught an M Cook my dope fast forward, sell lean in slow motion 4 am, still goin' 8 am, still smokin' Caught a charge and beat it Gucci Mane, I'm undefeated Red bottom's on all my hoes, all my bitches are so conceited Front flip, I'm flippin' bricks Backflip, you hustle backwards Your girlfriend is unattractive Could've but I didn't smash her Call me 4 eyes with these Gucci glasses Trap school; better take some classes Algebra; I didn't pass it, but a Mil' got there the fastest Rush hour; I'm stuck in traffic Kush hour; I'm passin' gasses Ace of spades; straight out the bottle Gucci Mane don't do the glasses (It's Gucci!) We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie (yeah) Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit (huh?) She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (it's Gucci!) We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie (yeah) Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (yeah) I, I, I, I killed the parking lot, I think I'm Michael Myers. (dead) My rims so fat but I got these lil' skinny tires They locked me up and put me on probation, nigga. (true) The way I chase that white girl, they think I'm Jason, nigga I'm all in your dreams like I'm Freddy Krueger But I'm not Freddy baby, call me Freddy Mueller I need to go to rehab, I'm a drug abuser I drink so much cough syrup, they think I got the flu Smoked so much kush, I might need an organ donor Another set of lungs 'cause I'm a heavy smoker Popped so many bottles, need another liver And I don't plan on stopping 'cause I'm not a quitter (it's Gucci!) (It's Gucci!) We don't make porno's, we make horror flicks The way I kill a bitch, that shit a scary movie (yeah) Lil' momma choosin' but she on that scary shit (huh?) She wanna go, but I think that she scared of Gucci (it's Gucci!)
